answers.answer: Hello,Synthroid itself as a medication does not often cause erratic blood sugars , but the shift in thyroid hormone levels(that happen when you take any thyroid hormone medication) may do so. Weight changes may occur as well as changes in appetite, all of which also affect blood sugars. It should settle out soon, but keep a close eye on it in the interim.Take care.

question: My  mother has type 2 diabetes. She has recently been prescribed Synthroid.. Her blood sugar levels  have been erratic since.is this  a  possible side effect of synthroid?Thanks
title: synthroid and blood sugar level
